description: This file defines a React component for displaying and editing a note's details, integrating with Remix hooks and a notes library for data fetching, updating, and deletion.

methods.name: NoteDetail
methods.description: Main React component that manages the display and editing of a note based on URL parameters.

methods.name: useDebouncedEffect
methods.description: Custom hook implementing a debounce effect for autosaving note changes.
